<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 13+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Reflecting Shard](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2111)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 94 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Reaction" /><row>command</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You are targeted by a spell of 5th level or lower

**Requirement** You're a master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3), and you have the affixed shield [raised](/Actions.aspx?ID=98).
</row>

</column>

---

This mirrored metal fragment is bolted or welded to the face of the affixed shield. When you Activate it, you attempt to reflect the triggering spell back at its caster with [_spell turning_](/Spells.aspx?ID=297), using your Athletics modifier for the [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check. The talisman's counteract level is 7th.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Reflecting Shard (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

**Price** 2,500 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The talisman can reflect spells of any level, and its counteract level is 9th.
